item.description:
HSUS requires an rsvp at the following link:

http://action.humanesociety.org/site/Calendar/573486092

Boston, MA: Humane Lobby Day 2013 - April 25
Massachusetts State House


The Humane Society of the United States, the ASPCA and the MSPCA invite our members and supporters to participate in the 2013 Humane Lobby Day in Boston to help make a tremendous difference for animals.

This is an exciting opportunity to meet directly with your elected officials about legislation that will significantly impact the lives of animals. There will be a briefing with tips for citizen lobbying, and an overview of pending animal legislation which will prepare you to advocate for policies that will curb and end egregious acts of cruelty.

Legislators are most motivated when their constituents make time to meet with them face to face. By attending Humane Lobby Day 2013, you can be instrumental in helping to protect puppies from puppy mills, farm animals from cruel confinement and wildlife from poaching. RSVP today to lend your voice for animals and make a difference in 2013!

Please contact Massachusetts State Director Alexis Fox at afox@humanesociety.org if you have additional questions.

Thursday, April 25, 2013
11:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Address:
Massachusetts State House
24 Beacon Street
Boston, MA 02108
United States
item.name: Lobby our Massachusetts legislature with HSUS!
